### Chart 1
    
```{r}
fluidRow(
  column(12, selectInput("dataset_choice", "Select a dataset:",
                         choices = c("BodyTemp50", "Cereal", "BaseballSalaries2019", "StudentSurvey"),
                         selected = "BodyTemp50"))
)

fluidRow(
  column(12, plotOutput("histPlot", height = "300px"))
)

# Server logic
output$histPlot <- renderPlot({
  data <- get(input$dataset_choice, envir = as.environment("package:Lock5Data"))

  # Choose a valid numeric column depending on dataset
  var <- switch(input$dataset_choice,
                "BodyTemp50" = data$BodyTemp,
                "Cereal" = data$Sugars,
                "BaseballSalaries2019" = data$Salary,
                "StudentSurvey" = data$Height,
                NULL)

  ggplot(data.frame(x = var), aes(x = x)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.25, fill = "navyblue", color = "white") +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)), 
               color = "red", linetype = "dashed", linewidth = 1) +
    labs(title = paste("Population Histogram of", input$dataset_choice),
         x = "Value", y = "Frequency") +
    theme_minimal()
}, height = 300, width = 500)

```
